name: uiw-project
description: A high quality UI Toolkit, A Component Library for React 16+.

scripts.w:t:uiw: lerna exec --scope uiw -- tsbb types --outDir lib/esm --target ESNEXT --watch
scripts.w:ts:uiw: lerna exec --scope uiw -- tsbb watch --target react --env-name esm:dev --env-name cjs
scripts.type: npm run t:cjs && npm run t:esm
scripts.t:esm: lerna exec --scope @uiw/* --scope uiw --ignore @uiw/doc -- tsbb types --outDir lib/esm --target ESNEXT
scripts.t:cjs: lerna exec --scope @uiw/* --scope uiw --ignore @uiw/doc -- tsbb types --outDir lib/cjs --target ESNEXT
scripts.b: lerna exec --scope @uiw/* --scope uiw --ignore @uiw/doc -- tsbb build --target react
scripts.b:bundle:min: lerna exec --scope uiw -- GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false kkt build --bundle --no-checkRequiredFiles --mini --no-emptyDir
scripts.doc: npm run b:website && npm run b:doc
scripts.build: npm run b && npm run b:css && npm run type && npm run b:bundle && npm run b:bundle:min && npm run doc
scripts.deploy: npm run npm run b:website && lerna exec --scope @example/uiw -- npm run deploy
scripts.publish: npm run b:doc && lerna publish from-package
